dates.date: Slides from Mandatory Orientation on Feb 28
dates.title: PLEASE READ
dates.description: If you did not attend the mandatory orientation, please read through this deck. Companies have different requirements for forms, attire, IDs, etc. You need to know the expectations.

dates.title: MANDATORY Job Shadow Orientation
dates.description: Meet in the theater during tutorial for a mandatory meeting regarding student job shadow responsibilities and expectations.

dates.title: MANDATORY Job Shadow Orientation
dates.description: Meet in the theater during tutorial for a mandatory meeting regarding student job shadow responsibilities and expectations.

dates.title: Email your host
dates.description: Email your job shadow host, introducting yourself and confirming your attendance.

dates.title: JOB SHADOW DAY!
dates.description: Be on time, go prepared with questions, and learn!

dates.title: Thank yous and Survey
dates.description: Email your job shadow host, thanking them for the opportunity. Complete the JobCamp.org survey.
